resources.string: Hey there! Welcome to my calculator app! The next generation calculator!
I have been working on this app for days…but there are still some bugs…
For some reasons the app cannot be debugged, all fixes must now happen from inside the app.
Would you mind helping me out fixing it?
Great Thanks! Start by trying to fiddle around a little bit, see what is broken.
Hey! That 9 button is in the wrong position..but I cannot fix it from code…
Hey! That 1 button is in the wrong position..but I cannot fix it from code…
Could you try to find a way to fix it… just try something out, please…
Hey you fixed the positions of all the buttons! Thanks!
That button is not printing the correct symbol... but wait... I dont believe it!
That symbol.. Ive seen it before.. ive been having nightmares lately and that symbol keeps popping up...
Yes, some dark force obviously doesn\'t want my amazing calculator to go public
Please you have to fix that button ASAP before it is to late, money is at stake my friend!
Hey you fixed that button, now it shows the correct symbol! You are the best.
That \'extra 1\' button…it has a strange colour…have we seen that colour before somewhere?
Me neither, but it is definitely important. Keep a lookout for that colour.
